H0.text: which countries share a border with russia. China

H1.text: which countries share a border with russia. Ukraine

H2.text: which countries share a border with russia. Kazakhstan

H3.text: which countries share a border with russia. Poland

A4.text: The Chinese–Russian border or the Sino-Russian border is the international border between China and Russia.

A5.text: Its western end point is the China–Kazakhstan–Russia tripoint, whose location is defined by the trilateral agreement as 49°06′54″N 87°17′12″E, elevation, 3327 m.

A6.text: The Russian Border Agency lists border crossings on the border with China.

A7.text: The International Boundary Study No. 64 (Revised) – February 13, 1978 documents the China–U.S.S.R. Boundary.
